title: Whats up will the severs!?!?
body: Whats going on with the N.A severs today . Ive been trying to log in all day and play a match and i bought and Ip boast @1 am for one day and im not even going to get to use it. Does anyone know wharts going on ??

replies.body:
The login service went down shortly after the patch completed. We were able to get it back online and you should be able to log in now. 

Let me know if this is not the case.
